# Familiar Master Feats
## Overview
This section presents new feats for characters with familiars. Additionally, the new Familiar Bond feat allows any character to gain a familiar, regardless of class.


| **Feats** | **Prerequisites** | **Benefits** | **Source** |
|---|---|---|---|
| Familiar Bond | [[Iron Will (Feat)\|Iron Will]] | Gain a familiar | Familiar Folio 18 |
| Far-Roaming Familiar | Int 13, must have a familiar | Retain your empathic link to your familiar regardless of distance so long as you are on the same plane | Familiar Folio 18 |
| Improved Familiar Bond | Familiar Bond, [[Iron Will (Feat)\|Iron Will]] | Your familiar gains all the normal abilities available to a familiar of a wizard with a level equal to your total HD | Familiar Folio 18 |
| Telepathic Link | Must have a familiar with the speak with master ability | You and your familiar can communicate with each other telepathically at a range of up to 1 mile | Familiar Folio 18 |
| Improved Telepathic Link | Telepathic Link | Retain your telepathic link to your familiar regardless of distance so long as you are on the same plane | The Mage's Tower |
| Sensory Link | Telepathic Link | You and your familiar can share senses with each other telepathically at a range of up to 1 mile | The Mage's Tower |
| Improved Sensory Link | Improved Telepathic Link | Retain your sensory link to your familiar regardless of distance so long as you are on the same plane | The Mage's Tower |
